headline: ON Semiconductor (ON): Valuation in Focus Following AI Hardware Demand Surge and Improved Trade Sentiment
summary: ON Semiconductor (ON) shares jumped after news broke of Broadcom’s partnership with OpenAI, fueling expectations for heightened AI hardware demand. Calmer trade relations between the U.S. and China also gave the entire semiconductor sector a boost. See our latest analysis for ON Semiconductor. ON Semiconductor’s stock has swung sharply on shifting investor sentiment this year, but the most recent 1-day share price jump of 9.55% stands out amid a tough broader run. Shares are still down nearly...
